decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Design & Access Statement dated July 2019; Heritage Statement dated July 2019; Ecological Survey [Ref 0184.0001 Rev 0]; 1902-P-000;1902-P-001; 1902-P-SH-010; 1902-P-BH-D-100; 1902-P-SH-D-100; 1902-P-SH-D-101; 1902-P-SH-D-103; 1902-P-SH-D-201; 1902-P-WS-D-100; 1902-P-WS-D-102;1902-P-SH-X-100; 1902-P-SH-X-101; 1902-P-SH-X-200; 1902-P-SH-X-201; 1902-P-SH-X-202; 1902-P-SH-X-203; 1902-P-BH-X-100; 1902-P-WS-X-100; 1902-P-BH-X-200; 1902-P-BH-X-201; 1902-P-BH-X-202; 1902-P-BH-X-203; 1902-P-WS-X-200; 1902-P-WS-X-201; 1902-P-WS-X-202; 1902-P-WS-X-203; 1902-P-WS-200; 1902-P-WS-201; 1902-P-WS-202; 1902-P-WS-203; 1902-P-SH-200; 1902-P-SH-201; 1902-P-SH-202; 1902-P-SH-203; 1902-P-BH-200; 1902-P-BH-201; 1902-P-BH-202; 1902-P-BH-203; 1902-P-SH-300; 1902-P-SH-304; 1902-P-SH-320; 1902-P-WS-300; 1902-P-WS-303; 1902-P-WS-320; 1902-P-WS-321; 1902-P-BH-300 1902-P-BH-320; 1902-P-WS-101; 1902-P-WS-102; 1902-P-BH-101; 1902-P-BH-102; 1902-P-SH-102; 1902-P-SH-103; 1902-P-WS-098; 1902-P-BH-098; 1902-P-SH-098; 1902-P-WS-100; 1902-P-BH-100; 1902-P-SH-100; 1902-P-SH-101; 1902 Harrow Arts Centre Refurb - Boiler House Gazetteer dated 29.7.2019; Harrow Arts Centre Refurb - Workshops Gazetteer dated 29.7.2019; Harrow Arts Centre Refurb - The Laundry Gazetteer dated 29.7.2019; Appendix to 1902-S4-WS-Gazetter Full Resolution Photographs; Appendix to 1902-S4-SH-Gazetter Full Resolution Photographs; Appendix to 1902-S4-BH-Gazetter Full Resolution Photographs

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - Samples of all materials to be used in the external surfaces are to be provided to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the works.
REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the curtilage listed buildings.
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the details shown in the approved plans and supporting documents, for the laundry and the boiler house buildings, the existing windows and doors shall be retained and repaired unless:
a) a condition survey of the existing windows and doors to be removed AND
b) existing and proposed elevations to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20, sections to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20 and samples of the proposed windows and doors 
are provided to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of this aspect of the works. The works shall be completed in accordance with the approved details and thereafter be retained.

REASON: To ensure the existing windows and doors require replacement and to ensure that any replacement either matches the existing or is in keeping with the original design and character in order to protect the special architectural or historic interest of the curtilage listed buildings.
Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the details shown in the approved plans and supporting documents, proposed elevations to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20, sections to a scale of 1:10 or 1:20 and samples of the proposed windows and doors to the workshop are provided to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of this aspect of the works. The works shall be completed in accordance with the approved details and thereafter be retained.
REASON: To ensure the proposed windows and doors are in keeping with the original design and character in order to protect the special architectural or historic interest of the curtilage listed building.
Condition : 6 - Materials from the stables building to be demolished are to be retained on site and reused in the repair and restoration of the remaining curtilage listed buildings that are the subject of this application in accordance with the plans hereby approved.
REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the curtilage listed buildings.
Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans, the following landscaping and tree protection details shall be submitted to, and improved in writing by, the local planning authority prior to the commencement of works other than demolition:

a)Tree protection plan for the existing tree/s in proximity to the development, including the tree to the east of the workshops and trees to the north of the studio (if retained)
b) Hard landscape Material Details
c) Levels, existing and proposed levels.

REASON: To ensure a high quality of development and protection of high value trees on site and the setting of the listed and curtilage listed buildings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of The London Plan (2016), policy CS.1 of the of the Harrow Core Strategy 2012, and policies DM1, DM7, and DM22 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: External alterations and refurbishment of the laundry, boiler house and workshops. Laundry to be used as a dance studio, classroom & hireable space; Boiler House to be used as hireable space; and Workshops to be used as artists' studios. Associated landscaping. (Demolition of existing glazed extension and stables to the rear of the laundry, building to side and adjoining walls to the Boiler House)"
